translations.text: In the name of Allah, the Merciful, the Compassionate<sup foot_note="176997">1</sup>
Praise<sup foot_note="176998">1</sup> be to Allah, the Lord<sup foot_note="176999">2</sup> of the entire universe.
The Master of the Day of Recompense<sup foot_note="177001">1</sup>.
You alone do we worship<sup foot_note="177002">1</sup>, and You alone do we turn for help<sup foot_note="177003">2</sup>
Direct us on to the Straight Way<sup foot_note="177004">1</sup>,
The way of those whom You have favoured<sup foot_note="177005">1</sup>, who did not incur Your wrath, who are not astray<sup foot_note="177006">2</sup>.
